channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: 'We can't catch a break.' How the Biden crisis looks from the inside
item.description: Hit by a rolling series of punches – turmoil after Biden's disastrous debate, a drip-drip of damaging leaks, and now a presidential case of COVID – people inside the Biden campaign are discouraged.
item.content:encoded:
Hit by a rolling series of punches – turmoil after Biden's disastrous debate, a drip-drip of damaging leaks, and now a presidential case of COVID – people inside the Biden campaign are discouraged.

(Image credit: Kent Nishimura/AFP via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Tamara Keith

item.title: Lou Dobbs, the controversial Fox News host, has died
item.description: The longtime Fox contributor was 78 years old.
item.content:encoded:
The longtime Fox contributor was 78 years old.

(Image credit: Alex Brandon)
item.dc:creator: Alana Wise

item.title: Jesse Owens' high school is trying to revive its track team
item.description: The Olympic Games will soon begin. The high school where legendary track star Jesse Owens got his start is reviving the boys track and field team.
item.content:encoded: The Olympic Games will soon begin. The high school where legendary track star Jesse Owens got his start is reviving the boys track and field team.
item.dc:creator: Gabriel Kramer

item.title: What happened to the glamorous days of airline travel? You pay for what you get
item.description: Airline travel used to be glamorous, lavish even. How did the experience of flying coach become so widely disparaged? It's a five decade long story of deregulation. And in the end, we customers may just be getting exactly what we asked for.
item.content:encoded: Airline travel used to be glamorous, lavish even. How did the experience of flying coach become so widely disparaged? It's a five decade long story of deregulation. And in the end, we customers may just be getting exactly what we asked for.
item.dc:creator: Erika Beras

item.title: 25 years ago today, NPR's Scott Detrow went to a perfect baseball game
item.description: In 1999, a 14-year-old Scott Detrow was one of 42,000 fans crowded into the old Yankee Stadium on a steamy Sunday afternoon. What followed was a perfect game.
item.content:encoded: In 1999, a 14-year-old Scott Detrow was one of 42,000 fans crowded into the old Yankee Stadium on a steamy Sunday afternoon. What followed was a perfect game.
item.dc:creator: Scott Detrow

item.title: A newly-discovered dinosaur may have spent part of its life underground
item.description: A new dinosaur has been discovered in Utah by North Carolina researchers and paleontologists. They believe it was a burrowing species.
item.content:encoded: A new dinosaur has been discovered in Utah by North Carolina researchers and paleontologists. They believe it was a burrowing species.
item.dc:creator: Jordan-Marie Smith

item.title: More details emerge on the assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump
item.description: The latest information about what went wrong in the Secret Service protection plan for President Trump last Saturday, with developments in Butler, Penn., and Washington, D.C.
item.content:encoded: The latest information about what went wrong in the Secret Service protection plan for President Trump last Saturday, with developments in Butler, Penn., and Washington, D.C.
item.dc:creator: Martin Kaste

item.title: Donald Trump is set to accept his party’s nomination for president at the RNC tonight
item.description: Thursday is the last night of the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee. Trump is expected to deliver a “deeply personal message” shaped by the assassination attempt on his life on Saturday.
item.content:encoded: Thursday is the last night of the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee. Trump is expected to deliver a “deeply personal message” shaped by the assassination attempt on his life on Saturday.
item.dc:creator: Sarah McCammon

item.title: Outdated HIV prevention rules are hindering cornea donations, advocates say
item.description: A Colorado doctor is co-leading a campaign to end restrictions on cornea donations from men who have sex with men. Advocates say an outdated HIV prevention policy bars hundreds of donations a year.
item.content:encoded: A Colorado doctor is co-leading a campaign to end restrictions on cornea donations from men who have sex with men. Advocates say an outdated HIV prevention policy bars hundreds of donations a year.
item.dc:creator: Elaine Tassy

item.title: Days are getting slightly longer — and it’s due to climate change
item.description: So much ice is melting at the Earth's poles that it's affecting the rotation of the planet, scientists say. Its spin is slowing down slightly, causing days to get longer.
item.content:encoded: So much ice is melting at the Earth's poles that it's affecting the rotation of the planet, scientists say. Its spin is slowing down slightly, causing days to get longer.
item.dc:creator: Lauren Sommer
